mapper.select: SELECT r.agent_id agentId, r.merchant_number merchantNumber, r.merchant_name merchantName, DATE_FORMAT(r.traded_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') tradedTimeStr, r.amount, r.terminal_number terminalNumber, r.traded_status tradedStatus, r.pay_channel_id payChannelId, r.trade_number tradeNumber, r.batch_number batchNumber, r.profit_price profitPrice, r.poundage, t.pay_from_account payFromAccount, t.pay_into_account payIntoAccount FROM trade_records r JOIN trade_transfer_repayment_records t ON r.id = t.id WHERE r.id = #{tradeRecordId}

SELECT r.agent_id agentId, r.merchant_number merchantNumber, r.merchant_name merchantName, DATE_FORMAT(r.traded_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') tradedTimeStr, r.amount, r.terminal_number terminalNumber, r.traded_status tradedStatus, r.pay_channel_id payChannelId, r.trade_number tradeNumber, r.batch_number batchNumber, r.profit_price profitPrice, r.poundage, DATE_FORMAT(t.payed_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') payedTimeStr FROM trade_records r JOIN trade_consume_records t ON r.id = t.id WHERE r.id = #{tradeRecordId}

SELECT r.agent_id agentId, r.merchant_number merchantNumber, r.merchant_name merchantName, DATE_FORMAT(r.traded_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') tradedTimeStr, r.amount, r.terminal_number terminalNumber, r.traded_status tradedStatus, r.pay_channel_id payChannelId, r.trade_number tradeNumber, r.batch_number batchNumber, r.profit_price profitPrice, r.poundage, r.account_name, r.account_number FROM trade_records r WHERE r.id = #{tradeRecordId}

SELECT r.agent_id agentId, r.merchant_number merchantNumber, r.merchant_name merchantName, DATE_FORMAT(r.traded_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') tradedTimeStr, r.amount, r.terminal_number terminalNumber, r.traded_status tradedStatus, r.pay_channel_id payChannelId, r.trade_number tradeNumber, r.batch_number batchNumber, r.profit_price profitPrice, r.poundage, t.phone FROM trade_records r JOIN trade_recharge_records t ON r.id = t.id WHERE r.id = #{tradeRecordId}
